result.execSummary:
The defendant Darrin P. Wilson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Report no later than 6 p.m. on 8-28-14.
Huber privileges.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darrin P. Wilson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Darrin P. Wilson in court with attorney Robert A Kennedy.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called 2:13 p.m. Agreement stated - State moves to amend ct 1 to misd bail jumping 946.49(1)(a), def will plea to both cts, 10 days jail and costs on each ct, concurrent jail time. Atty Kennedy agrees. Def agrees. Court amends ct 1 to misd bail jumping. No contest plea. Ct 2 - no contest plea. Court reviews plea quest. and constitutional rights. Atty Kennedy satisfied/factual basis. Court finds Def understands, accepts pleas and finds guilty of ct 1 misd. bail jumping and ct 2 possess drug paraphernalia. Def has nothing to say. Court accepts agreement. Ct 1 - 10 days jail. Ct 2- 10 days jail, concurrent. Report no later than 6 p.m. on 8/28/14. Huber. Costs on each ct. Must be paid in full by 4:30 p.m. on 8/15/14. Postconviction rights.

Defendant Darrin P. Wilson in court with attorney Robert A Kennedy.  Ralph M Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Time limits waived for preliminary.  Reserve jurisdictional motions.  Bond has been set.   Bond will continue  Status conference scheduled for July 7, 2014 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Darrin P. Wilson in court.  Jill L Laufenberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Kennedy filed letter requesting an adjournment to post retainer fee.  Bond will continue  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 2, 2014 at 01:13 pm.

Defendant Darrin P. Wilson in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State request signature bond.  Complaint received.  Court reads charges with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to counsel.  Bond set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 28, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
